may also be tubes and wires 
attached to their face and body. 
Ask the nurse to explain what 
everything is for and to show 
you how you can be involved 
with your baby’s care. Once your 
baby is stable, you will be able to 
hold them. The nurses will show 
you how to do this.
Feeding
All	babies	benefit	from	receiving	
their mother’s breastmilk. It 
is more important for sick 
or premature babies to get 
breastmilk. To begin with, your
